document.heading: Tax Increment Financing Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-144, the “Tax Increment Financing Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-553, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 2002, and March 19, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 2, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-321 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-144 became effective on May 22, 2002.
